key-binding.alias: Product.shortDescription != null ? Product.shortDescription.getMarkup() : "Shop " + Product.name + " and see our entire collection of " + Product.custom.brandSegment.displayValue + " " + Product.custom.pillar.displayValue + ". Shoes are boring. Wear sneakers."

text-node.description: Include size. Must not be cached.
Include recentlyviewed. Must not be cached.
Include pixlee. Must not be cached.

start-parameter.description: The product that is currently viewed

pipelet-node.custom-name: Setting Maximum number of last visited products to display.
Fetching last visited products (fetching one additional product in case the currently viewed product is in the list)
